connect20/wiseboost_wishlistcounter.name: connect20/Wiseboost_WishlistCounter

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/wiseboost_wishlistcounter.description: WISHLIST COUNTER is an extension that will count the number of persons who have an item in their wishlist and displays it on the product page (or in category listing).
